/usr/bin/c++   -lportaudio -lasound -lrt -lm -pthread -std=c++11 -g     CMakeFiles/new_main_live.dir/new_main_live.cpp.o CMakeFiles/new_main_live.dir/wav_utils/record_voice.cpp.o CMakeFiles/new_main_live.dir/wav_utils/write_wav.cpp.o  -o new_main_live -rdynamic /opt/intel/computer_vision_sdk/inference_engine/lib/centos_7.4/intel64/libinference_engine.so -lpthread -ldl -Wl,-rpath,/opt/intel/computer_vision_sdk/inference_engine/lib/centos_7.4/intel64
